First, I identify the line item related to the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount over its useful life, which is the depreciation expense.

From the provided cash flow and income statement data, I see the line item labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45749.47 in the latest period (2024-01-29).

In depreciation accounting, this expense reflects the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

Therefore, the specific line item and value of the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life is "Depreciation" with a value of 45749.47.
